onBoarding.sliderDescription1: Explore solar panels, inverters, batteries and power systems at NBS. Find new energy solutions, top brands and reliable products every week.
onBoarding.sliderDescription2: 20+ trusted brands and over 2,000+ energy products. Discover the best power solution for your needs with easy support and return options.
onBoarding.sliderDescription3: Latest solar systems, power backups and water pumps every week. Premium quality. Fast delivery available. Hassle-free installation and secure service.

policySection.content: This product is eligible for returns and size replacements. Please initiate returns/replacements from the 'My Orders' section in the App within 7 days of delivery. Please ensure the product is in its original condition with all tags attached.

productDetail.discription: Black, off-white and peach-coloured printed flared skirt, has zip closure, attached lining

customerReview.name: Mark Jacob
customerReview.review: It's a really cute skirt! I didn't expect to feel so good in a polyester material. The print is slightly less bright than what is shown in the product description.
customerReview.review1: Wow.. but it should have more flairs. mind-blowing purchase..ü§ó

termsCondition.introContent: These Website Standard Terms and Conditions written on this webpage shall manage your use of our website, multikart accessible at www.multikart.com.
termsCondition.introContent1: These Terms will be applied fully and affect to your use of this Website. By using this Website, you agreed to accept all terms and conditions written in here. You must not use this Website if you disagree with any of these Website Standard Terms and Conditions. These Terms and Conditions have been generated with the help of the Terms And Conditiions Sample Generator.
termsCondition.intellectualContent: Other than the content you own, under these Terms, Multikart and/or its licensors own all the intellectual property rights and materials contained in this Website.
termsCondition.intellectualContent1: You are granted limited license only for purposes of viewing the material contained on this Website.
termsCondition.restricted: You are specifically restricted from all of the following:
termsCondition.restrictionContent: publishing any Website material in any other media
termsCondition.restrictionContent1: selling, sublicensing and/or otherwise any Website material
termsCondition.restrictionContent2: publicly performing and/or showing any Website material
termsCondition.restrictionContent3: using this Website in any way that is or may be damaging to this Website
termsCondition.restrictionContent4: using this Website in any way that impacts user access to this Website
termsCondition.restrictionContent5: using this Website contrary to applicable laws and regulations, or in any way may cause harm to the Website, or to any person or business entity
termsCondition.restrictionContent6: engaging in any data mining, data harvesting, data extracting or any other similar activity in relation to this Website
termsCondition.restrictionContent7: using this Website to engage in any advertising or marketing.
termsCondition.content: Certain areas of this Website are restricted from being access by you and Multikart may further restrict access by you to any areas of this Website, at any time, in absolute discretion. Any user ID and password you may have for this Website are confidential and you must maintain confidentiality as well.
termsCondition.yourDesc: In these Website Standard Terms and Conditions, 'Your Content' shall mean any audio, video text, images or other material you choose to display on this Website. By displaying Your Content, you grant Multikart a non-exclusive, worldwide irrevocable, sub licensable license to use, reproduce, adapt, publish, translate and distribute it in any and all media.
termsCondition.yourDesc1: Your Content must be your own and must not be invading any third-party‚Äôs rights. Multikart reserves the right to remove any of Your Content from this Website at any time without notice.
